title: Understanding Center Across Selection
text: To center text across multiple cells without merging them, you can use the 'Center Across Selection' feature. This is often found in the alignment settings of your spreadsheet software.

title: Where to Find the Option
text: The 'Center Across Selection' option is typically located in the 'Format Cells' dialog under the 'Alignment' tab. This allows you to align text across a range of cells without merging them.

title: Steps to Center Across Selection
text: To center text across a selection, first highlight the cells you want to center across. Then, go to 'Format Cells', navigate to the 'Alignment' tab, and select 'Center Across Selection'.
